title: List of corruption scandals in Romania
data: Andreea Cosma [ ro ] ( deputy , Social Democratic Party ) Florin Serghei Anghel [ ro ] ( former President of Prahova County Council ) Dănuț Marcel Cornea ( former councillor , Prahova County Council )

Sentenced to 4 years imprisonment for complicity to abuse of power ( Andreea Cosma ) , instigating to abuse of power ( Florin Anghel ) and abuse of power ( Dănuț Marcel Cornea ) in the case of selling the Ciuperceasca casern at an undervalued price
Constantin Nicolescu [ ro ] ( former chairman of Argeș County Council )
Sentenced to 8 years in prison for bribery
Nicușor Constantinescu [ ro ] ( former chairman of Constanța County Council )

Sentenced to 15 years imprisonment for authorizing illegal payments in his role as chairman of the Constanța County Council , causing damages amounting to over 30 million lei ( €6,725,000 ) to the Council and over 1 million lei ( €224,000 ) to the Romanian state
Nicușor Constantinescu [ ro ] ( former chairman of Constanța County Council )
Sentenced to six years imprisonment for abuse of power in a case related to not issuing or extending permits for wind farms
Dumitru Dragomir ( former chairman of the Professional Football League )
Dumitru Dragomir was sentenced to 7 years imprisonment for tax evasion , embezzlement and money laundering

Gabriel Popoviciu [ ro ] ( Businessman ) Ioan Niculae Alecu ( former rector of the University of Agronomic Sciences and Veterinary Medicine , Bucharest ) Ilie Cornel Şerban ( former Director of the General Directorate for Intelligence and Internal Security ) Petru Daniel Pitcovici ( former chief of the Operations Division of the Anti-Corruption General Directorate )

The main charge of this corruption scandal is related to the sale of 224 hectares of land belonging to the University of Agronomic Sciences and Veterinary Medicine ( UASVM ) at an undervalued price . Gabriel Popoviciu ( a.k.a . Puiu Popoviciu ) was sentenced to 9 years imprisonment , Ioan Niculae Alecu ( the former rector of the UASVM ) - to 6 years imprisonment , Ilie Cornel Şerban - to 2 years and a half imprisonment , Petru Daniel Pitcovici - to 2 years imprisonment
Ilie Carabulea [ ro ] ( Wealthy businessman ; founder and former CEO of Banca Comercială Carpatica )
Sentenced to 6 and a half years imprisonment for bribery
Gergely Olosz [ ro ] ( Senator , former President of the Regulatory Authority for Energy )
Sentenced to 3 years imprisonment for influence-peddling
Gheorghe Costin [ ro ] ( Member of Parliament ; Deputy Mayor of Beiuș )

Convicted for fraud , false declarations and abuse of power . He provided preferential treatment in tenders for the company , Top Construct Group , whilst he was Deputy Mayor of Beiuș . Furthermore , he signed off on payments towards the company for false activities and works
section_title: Investigations resulting in convictions , subject to appeal
